channel.title: CoD4 is too easy
channel.description:
It's come to my attention that CoD4 is soo flawed and soo easy, I do think this is why Tico loves it. Today I was playing with Atrox on Search and Destroy just before the england match started, and while he was idle I got 16 kills and only died 2 times while using the default demolitions class.
Before that, I sent Atrox and Tico a message showing them why CoD4 is flawed and how stupid it is, I won't spoil the video for you but in all honestly if that can happen I want to know what else can possibly happen.
http://devbean.net/Wallshot/ is the second video I was on about.

item.title: CoD4 is too easy
item.dc:creator: @atrox atrox_
item.description:
@atrox wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:11, topic:300267”][quote author=933pm link=topic=396556.msg2947399#msg2947399 date=1252277009]
Playing soccer irl is fun, never got into the video games…

Halo > CoD
[/quote]
Jump and shoot… Jump and shoot… Jump and shoot… Jump and shoot…

Jump…

Shoot…

Still jumping…

Still shooting…

Jump… Shoot…[/quote]
you forgot punch somewhere in there.

item.description:
@Frostie21 wrote:

Cowie`:

Jump shooting isn’t anything just for halo - http://devbean.net/LewisSuxxxx/LewisSuxxxx.html - I did quite a few jump shots and drop shots uno.

I watched the first like 3mins and you play a lot like I do,but I don’t think I’m amazing.
